snippet: David Einhorn’s case against the website Seeking Alpha could affect the future of business journalism. | Foreign investors in Russia are beginning to sound the alarm. | A boutique advisory firm played an important role in the Vodafone-Ono deal. |...
abstract: David Einhorn’s case against the website Seeking Alpha could affect the future of business journalism. | Foreign investors in Russia are beginning to sound the alarm. | A boutique advisory firm played an important role in the Vodafone-Ono deal. | Turnover continues at SAC Capital Advisors.

headline.main: Taking Aim at an Anonymous Blogger
